activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12128
activity.text:
> You might be searching just for created_by, but that isn't the only use case:
> 
> Ex: `file.archived_by?.username` in Archived File Dialog or `file.uploaded_by?.username` in FilesTab; search for `.username` mentions in the codebase.
> 
> Though check the specific file as well, in some cases, we are displaying both username and username's first/last name, so they should be kept as is (unless it's not using formatName, ex: in PatientHome, `{patientData.created_by?.first_name}{" "}{patientData.created_by?.last_name}`

I think now it's done.

A file contains both ( {formatName(userData)} and {userData.username} ) kept as it is because they show both username and name.

Other than this, I changed all required files.
